name: Brick Breaker: Neon Arcade
description:
Atari breakout- Neon Arcadia: Brick breaker is a fun games yet addictive brick breaker game with exciting level up with the goal to achieve the highest level possible by bounce breaking, bounce shattering, bounce exploding, bounce crashing, bounce blasting, bounce smashing, bounce destroying bricks with a effective blast ball bounce aim from a paddle. 

By playing this one of new arcade games Atari breakout- Neon Arcadia: Brick breaker game you will also have a chance to enjoy amazing level up, visual effects, smooth ball bounce aiming and shooting, a variety of exciting and challenging stages, different kinds of neon Power ups to amplify the the amount of different playing, aiming strategies and the excitement of this fun experience whenever you move to next stage!

Enjoy the endless fun and invite your friends to level up in the arcade games as well!

[HOW TO PLAY Arcadia breakout]

- Use in one finger to move and swipe the paddle to bounce the ball
- Destroy the bricks until the stage is cleared
- When the left possible moves in the top corner comes down to a 0 - then it's game over.
- Use both intuition and the strategy to win the game.

[GAME FEATURES]

- Dozens of flow free fire levels
- Use Power up to clear the stages
- Easy to navigate & comfortable game interface
- Break the obstacles with multi-balls effect
- An impressive variety of obstacle and their colors
- Black obstacles 
break in one time, red EXPLODE , blue SHATTER!

[MAP GAME]

- This Atari breakout game is completely free, fun and addicting.
- Supports all phones devices.
- This game contain ads like interstitial, rewarded ads.
